com.nalinstudios.iscan.internal

Class ZoomHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nalinstudios.iscan.internal.ZoomHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.view.ScaleGestureDetector.OnScaleGestureListener, android.view.View.OnTouchListener

    public class ZoomHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements android.view.View.OnTouchListener, android.view.ScaleGestureDetector.OnScaleGestureListener
    A class to handle zoom events in the ScannerActivity.
    Author:
    Nalin Angrish.
